Description: Pear-shaped mace-head of banded limestone with central boring and part of the wooden haft.
Curator's comments: Published: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, 'Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna' (London, 1911), 21, 33; pl. xx.3, viii.39 A model mace head of the same shape, made of clay, was found in the same tomb (see EA 49009).
